alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 02 at 2:44PM MDT until November 03 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. For the Wasatch Mountains I-80 North, total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches with locally higher amounts. For the Wasatch Mountains South of I-80, total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches with locally higher amounts. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North and Wasatch Mountains South of I-80. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected, especially for seasonal routes and mountain passes. Backcountry access will become treacherous and should be taken into consideration for hikers, hunters, and other recreators. Be prepared for possible traction restrictions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80
